{{Doomwiki}} id Software was the creative force that made [[Doom]]. In particular, the members of id Software (some of whom are not necessarily part of the team anymore) that were responsible were: *'''Programmers''' **[[John Carmack]] **Michael Abrash **[[John Romero]] **Dave Taylor *'''Art'''
**Adrian Carmack **Kevin Cloud *'''Biz''' **Jay Wilbur *'''Design''' **Sandy Petersen **[[John Romero]] **American McGee **Shawn Green Special thanks are also granted to Tim Willits and John Anderson, who helped by making maps for the the fourth episode of Doom, Thy Flesh Consumed. [[Tom Hall]], although uncredited, also helped significantly as a mapper before leaving id. The "id" in id Software is said to refer to a component of the human psyche, the force motivated by pleasure and greed alone, the dark side behind many of humanity's common drives. ==See Also== *[[Idgames archive]] [[Category:People]]
